name: SkyUI
summary: Elegant, PC-friendly interface mod with many advanced features.
description:
[center][img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/3575-0-1431941008.png[/img][/center]
[center]SkyUI is an elegant, PC-friendly UI mod for Skyrim with many advanced features. All improvements seamlessly integrate with the style of the original interface. Version 5 includes better crafting, enchanting, alchemy and smithing menus and several other enhancements.[/center]
[center][b]Core team[/b]: snakster, Mardoxx
[b]Artwork[/b]: psychosteve[/center]

[center][img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/3575-0-1431913254.png[/img][/center]
[list]
[*] Convenient inventory management with a feature-rich panel that supports full-text search, sorting and extended data columns.
[/list]
[list]
[*] [b]Version 5 extends this to all menus, including crafting, enchanting, alchemy and smithing.[/b]
[/list]
[list]
[*] A powerful, categorized favorites menu that still keeps true to the original idea of a fast, non-intrusive way to access your essential items. Eight customizable hotkey groups allow to explore playstyles that were way too tedious before.
[/list]
[list]
[*] The Mod Configuration Menu (MCM) to support user-friendly in-game customization. It's not just used by SkyUI, but by hundreds of other mods as well.
[/list]
[list]
[*] Full-text search and highlighting of discovered locations on the map.
[/list]
[list]
[*] Active effects are displayed directly in the HUD, instead of having to constantly open the magic menu. Highly customizable.
[/list]
[list]
[*] Gamepad support, and intuitive and efficient keyboard navigation.
[/list]
[list]
[*] Multi-language support for English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Polish, Czech and Japanese.
[/list]
[list]
[*] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=426512192]For a complete list, see the [i]Features Overview[/i][/url].
[/list]
[list]
[*] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9qzBT0ywHgk]For a visual tour, check out our latest trailer[/url].
[/list]


[center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/3575-0-1431941212.png[/img][/center]
[b][size=4][color=#7cbeff]STEP 1:[/color] Install the Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)[/size][/b]
[list][/list]
[list]
[*] [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/365720]Install SKSE from Steam[/url], or download the installer from [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]skse.silverlock.org[/url] and run it.
[*] Required SKSE version is 1.7.3 or newer.
[/list]

[b][size=4][color=#7cbeff]STEP 2:[/color] Install SkyUI[/size][/b]
[list][/list]
[list]
[*] [b][size=3]Option A - Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)[/size][/b]
[list]
[*] Click the [color=#7cbeff]Download (NMM)[/color] button on top of this page.
[*] [color=#7cbeff]Activate SkyUI[/color] in NMM.
[/list][/list]
[list]
[*] [b][size=3]Option B - Manual Installation[/size][/b]
[list]
[*] Locate the [color=#7cbeff]Data/[/color] folder in your Skyrim [color=#7cbeff]installation directory[/color]. Typically it's found at [color=#7cbeff]Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/[/color].
[*] Extract the contents of the downloaded archive file to your [color=#7cbeff]Data/[/color] folder.
[*] In the Skyrim Launcher, select [color=#7cbeff]Data Files[/color] and enable [color=#7cbeff]SkyUI.esp[/color].
[/list][/list]


[center][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/3575-0-1431912981.png[/img][/center]
[list]
[*] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=429510726]Questions about anything? Check out the [i]FAQ[/i][/url].
[/list]
[list]
[*] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=429076438]Did you run into a problem? Have a look at the [i]Troubleshooting Guide[/i][/url].
[/list]
[list]
[*] [url=https://github.com/schlangster/skyui/wiki]Are you a mod author interested in using MCM? The [i]Documentation[/i] explains how it works[/url].
[/list]

[center][img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/3575-0-1431941429.png[/img][/center]
[list]
[*] [i]T3T[/i], for creating the initial icon set that was used in earlier versions.
[*] [i]ianpatt[/i], for his continued support of SKSE.
[*] [i]Kratos[/i], for helping to get the project off ground when we started.
[*] [i]Verteiron[/i], for prototyping the Papyrus script for the favorites menu.
[*] [i]behippo[/i] and [i]PurpleLunchBox[/i], for their SKSE contributions.
[*] [i]Gibbed[/i], for prototyping the inventory data extension and container categorization.
[*] [i]GreatClone[/i], for his set of category icons that was used in earlier versions.
[*] [i]MisterPete[/i], for coming up with a scheme for improved column sorting.
[*] [i]Gopher[/i], for helping with the NMM installer and promoting SkyUI on his YouTube channel.
[*] [i]Indie[/i], for creating our first trailer.
[*] [i]Lojack[/i], for improving integration with Wyre Bash.
[*] [i]Ismelda[/i], for providing config values for very high resolutions used with multi-monitor setups.
[*] [i]Wakeupbrandon[/i], for inspiring the development of this mod with his mockups.
[*] [i]Pelinor[/i], for originally developing MCM for Fallout: New Vegas and allowing us to use his logo.
[*] [i]cdcooley[/i], for going out of his way to answer user questions on the Nexus sites.
[*] Thanks to all testers and users who provided feedback. You helped us a great deal with improving the quality of this mod. Also thanks to everyone who helped with the translations.
[/list]
author: SkyUI Team
